identification.name: Data Ingestor
identification.description: Module to ingest/update data into the ROC database

tasks.name: clear_rocdb
tasks.description: Clear content of ROC database.

tasks.name: move_processed_files
tasks.description: Move successfully processed input files into a target directory.

tasks.name: move_failed_files
tasks.description: Copy failed input files into a target directory.

tasks.name: check_dds_tmraw
tasks.description: Return list of MOC DDS TmRaw response XML file(s) to be processed (use to insert packet by chunk in the database)

tasks.name: check_dds_tcreport
tasks.description: Return list of MOC DDS TcReport response XML file(s) to be processed (use to insert packet by chunk in the database)

tasks.name: export_to_json
tasks.description: Export ROC pipeline database content into a JSON format file

tasks.name: tmraw_to_raw
tasks.description: Parse and store input MOC DDS TmRaw response XML file(s) into RawData object, but by chunks.

tasks.name: tcreport_to_raw
tasks.description: Parse and store input MOC DDS TcReport response XML file(s) into RawData object, but bu chunks

tasks.name: parse_file_tree
tasks.description: Parse file tree before logging files into the database

tasks.name: check_file_in_db
tasks.description: Checks if file is up-to-date in the database

tasks.name: search_missing_parents_files
tasks.description: Search for files with Missing parents in error_log

tasks.name: update_parents_in_db
tasks.description: Update parents_file_log table with existing missing parents

tasks.name: store_delivered
tasks.description: Store into file_log files that have been delivered by GFTS

tasks.name: store_public_filename
tasks.description: Store into file_log the name given for the ESA delivery

tasks.name: check_soar
tasks.description: Check delivered files are available in SOAR

tasks.name: search_for_update
tasks.description: Search files to be updated in file_log table

tasks.name: log_file_to_db
tasks.description: Log files into the database

tasks.name: l0_to_db
tasks.description: L0 files into the database

tasks.name: event_to_db
tasks.description: SOLO/RPW-related event data into the database

tasks.name: solohk_to_db
tasks.description: Insert Solo HK EDDS data files into the ROC database

tasks.name: db_to_solohk
tasks.description: Export solo_hk_param table data of the ROC database into output daily files

tasks.name: efecs_to_db
tasks.description: Insert Solo EFECS data files into the ROC database

tasks.name: update_utc_time
tasks.description: Make sure to have up-to-date utc_times in the ROC database

tasks.name: l0_to_hfrtimelog
tasks.description: HFR science TM time L0 info into the database

tasks.name: update_sbm_retrieved
tasks.description: Update pipeline.sbm_log.retrieved column in the ROC database
